layouts.title: Layouts
layouts.description: Layouts provide the majority use cases for laying out an application. They are not meant to be exhaustive so much as prescriptive about the most explicit and predictable way to create layouts.

skin.title: Redox Skin
skin.description: Properties that address the look of the app.

spacing-values-OFF.shortcut: @base-[ v[ -large[ r, st ] , -small[ er, est ], h..., top..., bottom..., left..., right... ]

location-size-values.shortcut: @base-[ top [ -large[ r, st ] , -small[ er, est ], bottom..., left..., right... ]

rows-size-values.shortcut: @base-[ large[ r, st ] , small[ er, est ] ]

rows-size-values-w-minus-plus.shortcut: @base-[ large[ r, st ](plus, minus) , small[ er, est ](plus, minus) ]

breakpoint-values.shortcut: @base-[ small[ min, max] , medium[ min, max] , large[ min, max] ]

transition-core-values.shortcut: @base-[ all, none, width, height, left, right, top, bottom ]

skin-location-power-values.shortcut: @base-[ top, bottom, left, right ( none, stong, weak (er,est) ) ]

color-values.shortcut: @base-[ light[ er, est ], dark[ er, est ] ]

size-values.shortcut: @base-[ large[ r, st ] , small[ er, est ] ]

simple-position-names.shortcut: @base-[ top, bottom, left, right, top-[left, right], bottom-[left, right]]

.a-height-0 {  height: 0  !important; }

.a-padding-0 {  padding: 0  !important; }
.a-padding-100 {  padding: 100%  !important; }

.a-margin-0 {  margin: 0  !important; }
.a-margin-100 {  margin: 100%  !important; }

utilities.name: flex-v
utilities.css_string: .a-flex-v {  display: flex !important;  flex-flow: column nowrap !important;  align-items: center !important;  }
css_array: .a-flex-v {  display: flex !important;  flex-flow: column nowrap !important;  align-items: center !important;  }
utilities.mixins_string:
@mixin a-flex-v () {
 display: flex;  flex-flow: column nowrap;  align-items: center;  }
mixins_array:
@mixin a-flex-v () {
 display: flex;  flex-flow: column nowrap;  align-items: center;  }

utilities.name: transform-center
utilities.css_string: .a-transform-center {  top: 50% !important;  left: 50% !important;  -ms-transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%) !important;  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%) !important;  }
css_array: .a-transform-center {  top: 50% !important;  left: 50% !important;  -ms-transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%) !important;  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%) !important;  }
utilities.mixins_string:
@mixin a-transform-center () {
 top: 50%;  left: 50%;  -ms-transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%);  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%);  }
mixins_array:
@mixin a-transform-center () {
 top: 50%;  left: 50%;  -ms-transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%);  transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%);  }

utilities.name: clear-fix
utilities.mixins_string:
@mixin a-clear-fix () {
 &:before, &:after { content: " "; display: table; }  &:after { clear: both; }  }
mixins_array:
@mixin a-clear-fix () {
 &:before, &:after { content: " "; display: table; }  &:after { clear: both; }  }
